0.4.0.name: wordpress/hello-claudia
0.4.0.description:
Windows Azure Japanese official character "Claudia Madobe" is plugin to speak a message on a dashboard. Only Japanese supports it now.

Functions

  1. The current time is displayed on the dashboard.
  2. Last post date until now, how long, you know what the post has not been updated.
  3. Adds a Claudia Madobe of your blog pages by entering the shortcode [claudia]. Example.
[claudia]Hello World![/claudia]
